feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:31 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: ENE 29 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
